title: WTB T206 with Lenox cigarettes back
author: rebelsart

posts.post_title: WTB T206 with Lenox cigarettes back
posts.post_content:
I am looking for T206 white border tobacco card(s) with the Lenox cigarettes brand backs.  Please email [url]rebelsart@aol.com[/url] with price and description if you have one available.  Prefer lower grades (good, g/vg, very good, etc.)
Thanks,
Art M.
